name: SCP Wiki Night Mode [ UPDATED ]
description:
Most credit goes to @anqxyr. I've only managed to make it work on all domains, fix every single visible error and many more. 

-Why didn't you send those fixes to @qnxyr?
Discussion doesn't work for me, infinity loading.
additional_info:
Update 8 18.05.21
-restored header
-changed background to dark on news page
-minor fixes

Update 7 06.02.21
-fixes on new layout

Update 6 05.02.21
-cropped and changed Internal Departments logos to .png
-minor fixes

Update 5 02.02.21
-changed bright color pages to darker colors.
-fixed gradient on new wiki
-minor fixes

Update 4 31.01.21
-added custom cursor /*If you dont want it, its on code 2 line 594*/
-fixed font color on tales archive
-inverted MTF .png logos
-minor fixes and changes

Update 3 31.01.21
-cookies pop-up background suits to theme
-'Permission error' now also suits to theme
-fixed interwiki iframe, now theres no scrollbar'
-changed some notes that were still on white background to dark
-replaced all MTF logos to .png and inverted them
-added support for 05 Command site
-scrollbar works now on all sites
-minor fixes and changes

Update 2 30.01.21
-added support for INT Archive
-added support for ULI
-added support for Traditional Chinese Wiki
-added support for Russian Wiki
-fixes on Traditional Chinese Wiki
-fixes on Russain Wiki
-fixes on Japanese wiki
-fixed most of white things on wikis that were remaining, fe. notes.
-fixes on things like; border colors, font colors
-minor fixes and changes
Few Notes: sorry for not updating it for a while, I just couldn't find time to do this.

Update 1 28.10.20
-now works on new url
-fixes on new layout
